name: Park Tool FR-5.2 Cassette Lockring Remover
description: Free that stuborn cassette with this lockring removal tool. Made of solid, heat-treated steel, the 1-inch base is compatible with wrenches and a bench vise.12 splines, 23.4mm across.Thin wall construction allows use without removal of cones and locknuts.Compatible with Shimano®, SRAM®, SunRace®, SunTour®, Chris King® cassette lockrings.Compatible with SRAM® 11 and 12-speed cassettes.Also fits Shimano® disc brake lockrings.
